clusters.title: 'A tragedy': 2,500 elderly patients stuck in hospital waiting for aged care
clusters.neutral_headline: Hospitals struggle with elderly patients awaiting aged care

items.title: 'A tragedy': 2,500 elderly patients stuck in hospital waiting for aged care
items.standfirst: States and territories will use a health ministers' meeting today to call on the federal government to do more to address what they say is a critical aged care crisis affecting hospitals around the nation.
items.content: States and territories will use a health ministers' meeting today to call on the federal government to do more to address what they say is a critical aged care crisis affecting hospitals around the nation.

ai_summary: 2,500 elderly patients are stuck in hospitals.
They are waiting for aged care placement.
States and territories will address the issue.
A health ministers' meeting will discuss the crisis.
The aged care crisis affects hospitals.
